document.full_text: the u.s. nuclear safety regulator took a closer look at the ability for u.s. plants to withstand power blackouts on thursday, a day after severe storms and tornadoes knocked out power to three nuclear reactors in alabama.
document.title: u.s. nuclear plants hit by storm are stable: nrc
lines_and_colors: the u.s. nuclear safety regulator took a closer look at the ability for u.s. plants to withstand power blackouts on thursday, a day after severe storms and tornadoes knocked out power to three nuclear reactors in alabama.
